title: Pesticide Free Farmers Market
description: Pesticide-free farmers market held twice a week at 2 locations. On Wednesday it is on Chiang Rai Road just off Nimmanhaemin road by the university fields. On Saturdays it's at the Mae Hia Agricultural Research Station outside of town - a free shuttle leaves from the gates every 30-60 minutes at Chiang Rai Road. Sells lettuce, spinach and other pesticide-free fruits and vegetables at reasonable prices. Also sells fresh orange juice. Map marker is for Wed location. Please see photo for map of Sat location.
